EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Microsoft Cloud Native Workshop_Des Moines_Q217.DesMoinesConfirmat
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Cloud-Native Workshop in Des Moines on May 31st. We hope you will leave this workshop with a better understanding of cloud-native development <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native]]> and how to adopt it moving forward. If you would like to participate in hands-on exercises please bring a laptop.
Date: Wednesday, May 31, 2017
Time:
11:00AM to 4:00PM
Location: Microsoft Des Moines 1408 Locust Street, Suite 102 Des Moines, IA, 50309 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Real+Office+Centers,+Santa+Monica/@34.0193967,-118.4945013,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0x3d06ccbca95fb3b6!8m2!3d34.0193967!4d-118.4945013]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team See Agenda
